itemDisplayName: Deploy the MedTech service with an Azure IoT Hub
description: The MedTech service is an optional service of the Azure Health Data Services designed to ingest data from multiple and disparate Internet of Medical Things (IoMT) devices. The MedTech service normalizes, groups, transforms, and persists device health data in the Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIRÂ®) service within an Azure Health Data Services workspace.
summary: This template deploys a MedTech service with the necessary Azure Health Data Services resources and an Azure IoT Hub with message routing to the device event hub.
